action_details: The medical supplies required for this emergency include a defibrillator to manage cardiac arrests, first aid kits for immediate treatment of wounds and injuries, oxygen tanks to provide supplemental oxygen to patients with respiratory distress, splints to stabilize broken limbs, bandages and gauze pads for wound dressing, antiseptic wipes to prevent infection, tourniquets to control bleeding, and basic life support equipment such as bag-valve-mask devices and automated external defibrillators.
